content:
You mentioned earlier that you have a daily stand-up meeting at 8:30 AM, and you usually spend about 30 minutes checking and responding to urgent work emails before that. So, you'll want to make sure you're at the office by 8:00 AM to get settled and prepared for the meeting.

Here's a rough outline of your morning routine to help you plan:

* 6:30 AM - Wake up
* 7:00 AM - Get ready for the day
* 7:30 AM - Have breakfast and get settled
* 8:00 AM - Arrive at the office, check and respond to urgent emails
* 8:30 AM - Attend daily stand-up meeting

Feel free to adjust this schedule as needed to fit your personal preferences and work style. Now that you've got your morning routine planned out, you can focus on preparing for your project and gathering the necessary resources and information. Good luck with your project, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any further assistance!
